titles.title: Panama Canal Commission Authorization Act, Fiscal Year 1996
To authorize expenditures for fiscal year 1996 for the operation and maintenance of the Panama Canal, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on National Security.

bill.summary: 3/29/1995--Introduced. Panama Canal Commission Authorization Act, Fiscal Year 1996 - Authorizes: (1) expenditures by the Panama Canal Commission for FY 1996 for the operation, maintenance, and improvement of the Panama Canal and for administrative expenses (limits reception and representation expenses of the Board); and (2) the use of Commission funds for the purchase of passenger motor vehicles for replacement only.
